about_the_game:
Ann awakes on the island of Ylina. No one has ever seen her and she doesn't remember anything. Yet, Ylina is the last land on Earth...

Explore the island of Ylina and find out about Ann's past in this adventure/action game. You can choose to wander around in the forest at dusk, explore deep underground ruins from another age, or take a walk on the beaches, staring at the endless ocean.
...Or, you can choose to face your destiny.



Among other things, Dreams of Ylina includes:
  • Exploration: Walk the hills, forests, mountains, beaches and underground of Ylina, wander in the sunset on the wild coast of the island, ...
  • Story: Discover what happened to Ann and what led her to Ylina,
  • Dialogs: Talk to the kind people of Ylina (well, most of them are kind) and enjoy their hospitality,
  • Treasures: Search in the buried ruins and in forgotten chests, to find items and weapons,
  • Quests: Help Ylinians and get their gartitude, maybe a gold coin or two (these are hard times...)
  • History: Learn about the history of Ylina and the events that forged its destiny...



Dreams of Ylina is an indie game made by Pangoweb.
Music by Phonochrome Prod and Pangoweb.

legal_notice:
All resources and assets of the game, including but not limited music, 3D models, plugins, are made either by pangoweb or a third-party creator.
In the case of third-party resources, the assets are used accordingly to the license of these assets, as mentioned by the creators.
In the case of assets made by pangoweb, all rights are reserved toits creator (pangoweb), and Phonochrome Production.
name: Dreams of Ylina

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750, 1Go
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Ann awakes on the island of Ylina. No one has ever seen her and she doesn't remember anything. Yet, Ylina is the last land on Earth...Explore the island of Ylina and find out about Ann's past in this adventure/action game!
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
